title: Oxford apple pie
ingredients: ['110g mixed dried fruit', '85ml brandy', '600g cooking apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', 'zest and juice of 1/2 orange', '85g soft brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 packet shortcrust pastry']
